fieldNotes.quote: Feels like something you’d thrift once and never find again. The weight, the drape—everything just clicks.
fieldNotes.author: Nate · Visual Designer

fieldNotes.quote: Has that old athletic department energy, but cleaned up. Like a hoodie they would’ve kept locked in the archives.
fieldNotes.author: Lex · Creative Runner

fieldNotes.quote: Wore it from a coffee run to a night session in the studio. Never stretched out, never lost shape.
fieldNotes.author: Mila · Photographer

fieldNotes.quote: The embroidery hits in person. People keep asking where it’s from every time I wear it.
fieldNotes.author: Dre · DJ & Curator

fieldNotes.quote: This is the hoodie I grab when I don’t want to overthink the outfit but still want it to feel intentional.
fieldNotes.author: Talia · Art Director

fieldNotes.quote: It has that vintage varsity DNA, but the fit is modern and clean. Not loud, just confident.
fieldNotes.author: Sage · Creative Consultant

fieldNotes.quote: Put it on for a flight and kept it on all weekend. Warm, heavy, and weirdly reassuring.
fieldNotes.author: Emi · DJ & Stylist

fieldNotes.quote: The hood actually holds its shape. No floppy sides, no weird collapse. It frames your face properly.
fieldNotes.author: Jordan · Creative Director

fieldNotes.quote: The inside feels like brushed fleece, the outside looks structured and sharp. It photographs insanely well.
fieldNotes.author: Kei · Filmmaker

fieldNotes.quote: Finally a hoodie that works for meetings, late-night drives, and early shoots without feeling try-hard.
fieldNotes.author: Lina · Founder

fieldNotes.quote: It hangs off the shoulders perfectly. Relaxed, but not sloppy. You can tell someone obsessed over the fit.
fieldNotes.author: Max · Stylist

fieldNotes.quote: The kind of hoodie that makes jeans, cargos, or sweats all feel like a full fit.
fieldNotes.author: Ro · Brand Strategist

fieldNotes.quote: Even after a few washes, the embroidery still looks crisp and raised. No sagging, no fuzz.
fieldNotes.author: Cam · Textile Designer

fieldNotes.quote: You put it on and instantly get that “archive piece” feeling, like it already has a story.
fieldNotes.author: Imani · Writer

fieldNotes.quote: Heavy enough for late-night walks, soft enough to crash on the sofa in. Basically lives on my chair now.
fieldNotes.author: Eli · Producer

fieldNotes.quote: The navy, cream and red combo just feels right. Classic but still different from what everyone else is wearing.
fieldNotes.author: Noor · Creative Assistant

fieldNotes.quote: It layers over tees and under coats without bunching. Whoever designed the pattern knew what they were doing.
fieldNotes.author: Jay · Art Student

fieldNotes.quote: Every time I go to hang it back up, I end up putting it back on. That’s the kind of piece this is.
fieldNotes.author: Hana · Curator

fieldNotes.quote: The ribbing at the cuffs and hem actually does its job. The silhouette stays clean all day.
fieldNotes.author: Luca · Motion Designer

fieldNotes.quote: It feels built for late nights, early mornings, and everything in between. Quiet, solid, reliable.
fieldNotes.author: Kai · Creative Producer

dropWindows.liveCopy: Drop window is live — secure your SNOOOM Hoodie now.
